actions: Tonifies the Spleen, augments Qi, dries Dampness and promotes water metabolism.
Tonifies Qi and Blood, strengthens the Spleen and generates Body Fluids.
With Bai Zhu, for Spleen Qi Deficiency with weakness, lassitude and loose stools.
Calms the Liver, anchors and preserves Floating Yang and prevents leakage of fluids.
With Mu Li, Xu Duan and Bai Zhu, for hypermenorrhea or uterine bleeding.
Calms the Liver, benefits the Yin, anchors Floating Yang and prevents leakage of fluids.
Clears Heat, cools the Blood, nourishes Yin and generates fluids.
Nourishes the Blood, regulates menstruation, astringes Yin, softens the Liver and relieves pain.
Restrains, holds in and stops bleeding, secures Jing and stops discharge.
With Qian Cao Gen, for excessive uterine bleeding.
Cools the Blood, invigorates the Blood, dispels Blood Stasis and stops bleeding.
With Hai Piao Xiao and Huang Qi, for Qi Deficient uterine bleeding.
With Long Gu, for Blood-streaked leukorrhea.
Tonifies the Liver and Kidneys, stops uterine bleeding, calms the fetus and prevents miscarriage.

symptoms: Bright red or dark red Blood
Menstrual blood is generally thick and dense
manifestations.tongue: Red body, slightly redder on sides

notes: This formula is generally used in conditions of long term bleeding where there is now Qi and Yin Deficiency.
